div.p: No. 11102, vol. 1860 P, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letter dated 11 December 1860. See also M to J. Moore, 12 December 1860 (in this edition as 60-12-12b). 11 December 1860

[Requests instructions relative to an applicn of messrs Cairns Wilson & Amos for permission to hold an auction for the sale of the materials of the "Grand Stand" recentlyoccupiedby the Caledonian Society]
